text:
Join us this Thursday - 6pm.
‘Rain does not fall on one roof alone’: #COVID19  vaccination choices. 
We'll be sharing facts, dispelling myths and discussing why there is so much #vaccine hesitancy among black people.
Feat: @DavidOlusoga, @PHE_uk and #NHS 

https://t.co/OJirZa1QMn https://t.co/PI6xmZl6CJ
